Text: I just wanted to share what I have with you. Long live The Pirate Bay.
Right now I'm starting to seed again.

The Extended Version was published in Italy only on 4th December 2012 on Blu-Ray, Runtime 250 Min. English and Italian Language. It doesn't contain all missing scenes, but is 20 Min. longer. Warner announced they won't publish this version outside of Italy. Still waiting for someone to find it.
I will try to find it.
Keep seeding as long as possible. Without seeding there will be no downloading people! By seeding you will keep this torrent alive.
